ContactPrePassDurationSeconds.description: Amount of time, in seconds, before a contact starts that the Ground Station Dataflow Endpoint Group will be in a PREPASS state. A Ground Station Dataflow Endpoint Group State Change event will be emitted when the Dataflow Endpoint Group enters and exits the PREPASS state.
ContactPrePassDurationSeconds.markdownDescription:
Amount of time, in seconds, before a contact starts that the Ground Station Dataflow Endpoint Group will be in a PREPASS state. A Ground Station Dataflow Endpoint Group State Change event will be emitted when the Dataflow Endpoint Group enters and exits the PREPASS state.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

ContactPostPassDurationSeconds.description: Amount of time, in seconds, after a contact ends that the Ground Station Dataflow Endpoint Group will be in a POSTPASS state. A Ground Station Dataflow Endpoint Group State Change event will be emitted when the Dataflow Endpoint Group enters and exits the POSTPASS state.
ContactPostPassDurationSeconds.markdownDescription:
Amount of time, in seconds, after a contact ends that the Ground Station Dataflow Endpoint Group will be in a POSTPASS state. A Ground Station Dataflow Endpoint Group State Change event will be emitted when the Dataflow Endpoint Group enters and exits the POSTPASS state.

Required: No
